diff_hunk:
@@ -56,6 +70,7 @@ def __init__(self):
         self._forward_pre_hooks = OrderedDict()
         self._modules = OrderedDict()
         self.training = True
+        self._name = ''
body:
Yeah, I think we just need to modify the deserialization part (`__setstate__`, I think I confused the names :-) ).
I think the only situation where the `_name` won't be assigned to a name is in the main model class, all others will have names, right? In this case, I think we could name it something like `model`?
